AGED 19, S/O MANIKUTTAN, R4 OLATTUPURAM HOUSE, CHERATI P.O., PALLIPPURAM VILLAGE, KOCHI TALUK, PIN 683 514 ADDL.R3 & ADDL.R4 ARE IMPLEADED AS PER ORDER DATED 04.01.2019 IN CRL.M.A NO.1/2018 BY ADV. SMT.MINI.V.A. OTHER PRESENT: SRI ALEX M THOMBRA-SR PP THIS CRIMINAL MISC. CASE HAVING COME UP FOR ADMISSION ON 04.01.2019, THE COURT ON THE SAME DAY PASSED THE FOLLOWING: 2019/KER/347 Crl.MC.No. 8315 of 2018 14.. ORDER Petition filed under Section 482 Cr.P.C. 2. Petitioners are the accused in Crime No. 1284 of 2018 of Munambam Police Station registered for the offences under Sections 143, 144, 147, 148, 308, 324, 326 & 452 r/w Section 149 of the Indian Penal Code. Respondents 2 to 4 are the victims. It is submitted that the matter has been settled and the proceedings in the criminal case may be quashed. 3. Heard the learned counsel for the petitioners and respondents 2 to 4 and the learned Public Prosecutor. 4. I have perused the affidavits filed by respondents 2 to 4, who have entered appearance through counsel. I am satisfied that the allegation of settlement is true and no public interest is involved. There is no 2019/KER/347 Crl.MC.No. 8315 of 2018 1.5e. impediment for granting the prayer of the petitioners. In the result, this Crl.M.C. is allowed. The proceedings in Crime No. 1284 of 2018 of Munambam Police Station are quashed. The learned magistrate may pass appropriate orders for the disposal of the material objects, if any, produced in the case. Sd/- K.ABRAHAM MATHEW JUDGE Bka/05.01.2019 fel BES rca ay 2019/KER/347 Crl.MC.No. 8315 of 2018 APPENDIX PETITIONER'S/S EXHIBITS: ANNEXURE A-1: THE CERTIFIED COPY OF THE FI STATEMENT AND FIR IN CRIME NO.1284/.2018 OF MUNAMBAM POLICE. ANNEXURE A-2: THE TRUE COPY OF THE AFFIDAVIT SWORN BY THE 2ND RESPONDENT.
